pergola-bioclimatique-guide-complet.title: Complete Guide: Bioclimatic Pergola in Belgium
pergola-bioclimatique-guide-complet.excerpt: Everything you need to know about bioclimatic pergolas: how they work, prices, installation and advantages. The ultimate guide to making the right choice.

content.intro: The bioclimatic pergola has become the ultimate outdoor living solution in Belgium. With its adjustable louvres, it offers optimal protection against sun, rain and wind, while allowing you to enjoy your terrace all year round. In this complete guide, we explain everything you need to know before investing in a bioclimatic pergola.

sections.title: What is a bioclimatic pergola?
sections.content: A bioclimatic pergola is an aluminum structure equipped with adjustable louvres on the roof. These louvres can rotate from 0 to 145 degrees, allowing you to precisely control the light and ventilation under your pergola. Unlike a traditional pergola, it adapts to weather conditions in real time.
list: Motorized adjustable louvres for precise control
100% aluminum structure resistant to all weather conditions

sections.title: Advantages of a bioclimatic pergola
sections.content: Investing in a bioclimatic pergola offers many advantages over traditional solutions. It's a smart choice for those who want to maximize the use of their outdoor space throughout the year.
list: Adjustable sun protection to your preference

sections.title: Price of a bioclimatic pergola in Belgium
sections.content: The price of a bioclimatic pergola varies depending on several factors: surface area, chosen options, and installation complexity. Generally, expect between 350 and 600 euros per square meter for a complete professional installation.

sections.title: Installation and regulations in Belgium
sections.content: In Belgium, installing a bioclimatic pergola is usually subject to a prior urban planning declaration. Rules vary by region (Wallonia, Flanders, Brussels). Our team guides you through all administrative procedures to ensure a compliant installation.
list: Prior declaration required in most cases
Maximum surface without permit: 40m2 (varies by region)
Compliance with stability and safety standards

content.conclusion: The bioclimatic pergola is a lasting investment that transforms your terrace into a true living space. At Archi Construction & Veranda, we offer custom solutions, installed by our expert teams. Contact us for a free quote and discover how we can bring your project to life.

veranda-aluminium-vs-pvc.title: Aluminum vs PVC Veranda: Which Material to Choose?
veranda-aluminium-vs-pvc.excerpt: Detailed comparison between aluminum and PVC verandas. Discover the advantages, disadvantages and prices of each solution.

content.intro: Are you considering extending your home with a veranda? The choice of material is crucial for the durability, aesthetics and thermal performance of your extension. In this article, we compare aluminum and PVC verandas in detail to help you make the best choice.

sections.title: Aluminum veranda: elegance and performance
sections.content: Aluminum is the premium material for modern verandas. It offers unmatched slim profiling, maximizing glass surface and natural light intake. Its natural corrosion resistance makes it ideal for the Belgian climate.
list: Excellent thermal insulation with thermal break

sections.title: PVC veranda: economical and insulating
sections.content: PVC remains a popular choice due to its excellent value for money. It's a naturally insulating material that offers good thermal performance. However, its thicker profiles reduce glass surface compared to aluminum.

sections.title: Thermal performance comparison
sections.content: Thermal insulation is an essential criterion in Belgium. Modern aluminum verandas with thermal break now achieve equivalent or even superior performance to PVC. The choice of glazing (double or triple) has more impact than the structure material.
list: Aluminum with thermal break: Uw 1.2 to 1.5

sections.title: Our recommendation
sections.content: At Archi Construction & Veranda, we recommend aluminum for most projects. Although the initial investment is slightly higher, the durability, aesthetics and value appreciation of your property more than compensate for this difference. PVC remains interesting for tighter budgets.
list: Aluminum: premium choice for high-end projects
PVC: economical solution for limited budgets

content.conclusion: Whether you choose aluminum or PVC, the key is to work with an experienced installer who can advise you based on your specific needs. Contact Archi Construction & Veranda for a personalized study of your veranda project.

carport-solaire-belgique.title: Solar Carport: Producing Electricity in Belgium
carport-solaire-belgique.excerpt: How to transform your carport into a green energy source? Complete guide on photovoltaic carports in Belgium.

content.intro: The solar carport combines two essential functions: protecting your vehicle from the elements and producing green electricity. In Belgium, where renewable energy incentives are attractive, it's a doubly profitable investment. Discover everything you need to know about photovoltaic carports.

sections.title: What is a solar carport?
sections.content: A solar carport is a vehicle shelter structure whose roof is equipped with photovoltaic panels. Unlike panels installed on a roof, the carport allows optimal orientation to maximize electricity production.
list: Photovoltaic panels integrated into the roof
Protection against sun, rain and hail

sections.title: Production and yield in Belgium
sections.content: Despite the Belgian climate, a solar carport produces enough electricity to cover a significant portion of your needs. A double carport (about 30m2) can accommodate 15 to 20 panels producing 5,000 to 7,000 kWh per year.
list: Payback in 6-10 years depending on region

sections.title: Incentives and subsidies in Belgium
sections.content: Financial support for solar panel installation varies by region. In 2026, green certificates in Wallonia and the reversing meter in Flanders remain attractive incentives.
list: Green loan at preferential rate available

sections.title: Electric vehicle charging
sections.content: The combination of solar carport and charging point is ideal for electric vehicle owners. You can charge your car with electricity produced directly by your carport, reducing your carbon footprint to zero.

content.conclusion: The solar carport is a future-proof solution that combines vehicle protection and renewable energy production. Archi Construction & Veranda offers you turnkey photovoltaic carports, with professional installation and grid connection. Request your free profitability study.

entretien-pergola-aluminium.title: How to Maintain Your Aluminum Pergola?
entretien-pergola-aluminium.excerpt: Practical tips for maintaining your bioclimatic pergola. Cleaning, maintenance and protection for a long lifespan.

content.intro: An aluminum pergola is designed to last for decades with minimal maintenance. However, a few simple steps help maintain its new appearance and ensure the proper functioning of its mechanisms. Here are our expert tips for maintaining your bioclimatic pergola.

sections.title: Regular cleaning of the structure
sections.content: Powder-coated aluminum doesn't rust and requires no special treatment. Cleaning with soapy water twice a year is enough to maintain your pergola's shine. Avoid abrasive products that could damage the finish.

sections.title: Maintenance of adjustable louvres
sections.content: The louvres are the key element of your bioclimatic pergola. Regularly check their proper functioning and clean them to prevent dirt buildup that could hinder their rotation.

sections.title: Rainwater drainage
sections.content: The water drainage system is essential for the longevity of your installation. Check that gutters and downspouts are not blocked by leaves or debris.

sections.title: Annual preventive maintenance
sections.content: We recommend an annual maintenance visit by a professional. This inspection helps detect potential problems before they worsen and ensures the longevity of your installation.

content.conclusion: Regular maintenance guarantees the longevity of your bioclimatic pergola and allows you to fully enjoy your outdoor space for many years. Archi Construction & Veranda offers maintenance contracts for complete peace of mind.

permis-urbanisme-belgique.title: Building Permits in Belgium: 2026 Guide
permis-urbanisme-belgique.excerpt: Everything about building permits for pergolas, verandas and carports in Belgium. Rules by region and administrative procedures.

content.intro: Before installing a pergola, veranda or carport, it's essential to know Belgian urban planning regulations. Rules vary by region (Wallonia, Flanders, Brussels) and construction type. This guide explains the procedures to follow to be compliant.

sections.title: Regulations in Wallonia
sections.content: In Wallonia, certain constructions are exempt from permits if they meet precise conditions regarding surface area and location. A pergola or carport of less than 40m2 may be exempt from permit under certain conditions.
list: At the rear of the building only

sections.title: Regulations in Flanders
sections.content: Flanders applies specific rules for annexes. The total surface of annexes (garage, veranda, carport, pergola) must not exceed 40m2 to be exempt from permit.

sections.title: Regulations in Brussels
sections.content: The Brussels-Capital Region is stricter. Most constructions require a building permit or prior declaration. Always consult your municipality's urban planning department.
list: Compliance with PRAS and municipal regulations

sections.title: Our support service
sections.content: Navigating urban planning regulations can be complex. Archi Construction & Veranda handles all administrative procedures for you. From feasibility study to file submission, we manage everything.

content.conclusion: Don't let administrative procedures slow down your project. At Archi Construction & Veranda, we support you from A to Z so your installation is perfectly compliant. Contact us for a free feasibility study.

tendances-outdoor-2026.title: Outdoor Living Trends 2026
tendances-outdoor-2026.excerpt: The latest trends in pergolas, verandas and outdoor living spaces. Design, materials and innovative technologies.

content.intro: The year 2026 marks a turning point in outdoor living. Current trends prioritize comfort, sustainability and technological integration. Discover the innovations transforming our outdoor living spaces into true living rooms.

sections.title: Home automation serving comfort
sections.content: Connected pergolas and verandas have become the norm. Remote control, weather sensors, integration with voice assistants: technology simplifies the management of your outdoor space.
list: Integration with Alexa, Google Home, Apple HomeKit

sections.title: Integrated LED lighting
sections.content: Lighting is no longer an option but a design element in its own right. LEDs integrated into the structure allow you to create varied ambiances and extend the use of your outdoor space after sunset.

sections.title: Sustainable and ecological materials
sections.content: Sustainability is at the heart of concerns. Recycled aluminum, high thermal performance glazing and eco-responsible finishes meet the expectations of environmentally conscious consumers.

sections.title: Living outdoor: the extra room
sections.content: The trend is to extend living space. Outdoor kitchen, lounge area, spa: the veranda and pergola become true additional rooms, usable year-round thanks to integrated heating systems.

content.conclusion: 2026 trends converge toward one goal: creating comfortable, connected and sustainable outdoor spaces. Archi Construction & Veranda integrates these innovations into all its projects. Contact us to discover how we can transform your outdoor space.
